00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 using System.Net;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using System.Web;
00028 using System.Xml;
00029 #endregion
00030 
00031 namespace Utilities.Web.PingBack
00032 {
00036     public static class PingBack
00037     {
00038         #region Public Static Functions
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043         public static void SendPingBack(PingBackMessage Message)
00044         {
00045             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Message.Source) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(Message.Target))
00046                 return;
00047 
00048             try
00049             {
00050                 HttpWebRequest Request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(Message.Target);
00051                 Request.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultNetworkCredentials;
00052                 HttpWebResponse Response = (HttpWebResponse)Request.GetResponse();
00053                 string PingURL = (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Response.Headers["x-pingback"])) ? Response.Headers["x-pingback"] : Response.Headers["pingback"];
00054                 Uri URIUsing;
00055                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(PingURL) && Uri.TryCreate(PingURL, UriKind.Absolute, out URIUsing))
00056                 {
00057                     Request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(URIUsing);
00058                     Request.Method = "POST";
00059                     Request.Timeout = 10000;
00060                     Request.ContentType = "text/xml";
00061                     Request.ProtocolVersion = HttpVersion.Version11;
00062                     Request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0b; Windows NT 6.0)";
00063                     Stream StreamUsing = (Stream)Request.GetRequestStream();
00064                     using (XmlTextWriter Writer = new XmlTextWriter(StreamUsing, Encoding.ASCII))
00065                     {
00066                         Writer.WriteStartDocument(true);
00067                         Writer.WriteStartElement("methodCall");
00068                         Writer.WriteElementString("methodName", "pingback.ping");
00069                         Writer.WriteStartElement("params");
00070                         Writer.WriteStartElement("param");
00071                         Writer.WriteStartElement("value");
00072                         Writer.WriteElementString("string", Message.Source);
00073                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00074                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00075                         Writer.WriteStartElement("param");
00076                         Writer.WriteStartElement("value");
00077                         Writer.WriteElementString("string", Message.Target);
00078                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00079                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00080                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00081                         Writer.WriteEndElement();
00082                     }
00083                     Request.GetResponse();
00084                     StreamUsing.Dispose();
00085                 }
00086             }
00087             catch (Exception e)
00088             {
00089                 throw e;
00090             }
00091         }
00092 
00098         public static PingBackMessage GetPingBack(HttpContext Context)
00099         {
00100             try
00101             {
00102                 return GetPingBack(Context.Request);
00103             }
00104             catch (Exception e)
00105             {
00106                 throw e;
00107             }
00108         }
00109 
00115         public static PingBackMessage GetPingBack(HttpRequest Request)
00116         {
00117             try
00118             {
00119                 PingBackMessage TempMessage = new PingBackMessage();
00120                 TempMessage.Source = "";
00121                 TempMessage.Target = "";
00122                 string RequestText = GetRequest(Request);
00123                 if (!RequestText.Contains("<methodName>pingback.ping</methodName>"))
00124                 {
00125                     return TempMessage;
00126                 }
00127                 XmlDocument XMLDocument = new XmlDocument();
00128                 XMLDocument.LoadXml(RequestText);
00129                 XmlNodeList Nodes = XMLDocument.SelectNodes("methodCall/params/param/value/string");
00130                 if (Nodes == null)
00131                 {
00132                     Nodes = XMLDocument.SelectNodes("methodCall/params/param/value");
00133                 }
00134                 if (Nodes != null)
00135                 {
00136                     TempMessage.Source = Nodes[0].InnerText.Trim();
00137                     TempMessage.Target = Nodes[1].InnerText.Trim();
00138                 }
00139                 return TempMessage;
00140             }
00141             catch (Exception e)
00142             {
00143                 throw e;
00144             }
00145         }
00146 
00151         public static void SendSuccess(HttpContext Context)
00152         {
00153             SendSuccess(Context.Response);
00154         }
00161         public static void SendError(HttpContext Context, int Code, string ErrorMessage)
00162         {
00163             SendError(Context.Response, Code, ErrorMessage);
00164         }
00165 
00170         public static void SendSuccess(HttpResponse Response)
00171         {
00172             Response.Write("<methodResponse><params><param><value><string>Success</string></value></param></params></methodResponse>");
00173         }
00174 
00181         public static void SendError(HttpResponse Response, int Code, string ErrorMessage)
00182         {
00183             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00184             Builder.Append("<?xml version=\"1.0\"?><methodResponse><fault><value><struct><member><name>faultCode</name>");
00185             Builder.Append("<value><int>" + Code + "</int></value></member><member><name>faultString</name>");
00186             Builder.Append("<value><string>" + ErrorMessage + "</string></value></member></struct></value></fault></methodResponse>");
00187             Response.Write(Builder.ToString());
00188         }
00189         #endregion
00190 
00191         #region Private Functions
00192         private static string GetRequest(HttpContext Context)
00193         {
00194             return GetRequest(Context.Request);
00195         }
00196 
00197         private static string GetRequest(HttpRequest Request)
00198         {
00199             byte[] TempBuffer = new byte[Request.InputStream.Length];
00200             Request.InputStream.Read(TempBuffer, 0, TempBuffer.Length);
00201             return System.Text.Encoding.Default.GetString(TempBuffer);
00202         }
00203         #endregion
00204     }

00222         private string _Target="";
